aboutMeText: Frontend-focused developer with 5+ years of experience crafting user-centric interfaces using React.js and Vue.js. Comfortable working with backend technologies like Node.js and Java with a focus on developing GraphQL and REST APIs. Currently enthusiastic about the potential of Machine Learning and AI to enhance user experiences. I'm actively exploring technologies like TensorFlow.js and other pre-made models.
